DOC.brief_summary: BI 655064 administer subcutaneously weekly patient immune thrombocytopenic purpura ( ITP ) 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Rising Does Study ( Subcutaneous Doses ) BI 655064 Male Female Patients With Chronic Primary Immune Thrombocytopenic Purpura ( ITP ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female chronic immune ITP patient Exclusion criterion : Any treatment ITP exclude except stable dose corticosteroid ( 20 mg )
